recipes.title: Grilled Veg Sandwich
recipes.description: A healthy grilled sandwich packed with fresh veggies.
steps: Spread butter and green chutney on each bread slice.
Place layers of potato, tomato, cucumber, and onion.
Cover with another slice of bread.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup or chutney.

recipes.title: Cold Coffee with Ice Cream
recipes.description: Creamy cold coffee topped with ice cream—perfect refresher.
steps: Mix coffee and sugar; pour over ice cream in a glass.
Top with whipped cream if desired.

recipes.title: Veg Pizza
recipes.description: Classic veg pizza with cheese and colorful toppings.
steps: Spread sauce on base, add veggies and cheese.

recipes.title: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipes.description: Quick chocolate mug cake ready in a minute.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a mug and microwave 70-90 seconds.

recipes.title: Veg Wrap
recipes.description: Tasty veg wrap for a light lunch or snack.
steps: Fill the tortilla with veggies and sauce.
Roll tightly and slice in half.
